title: Finite-Dimensional Representations of the Quantum Superalgebra U$_{q}$[gl(2/2)]: I. Typical representations at generic $q$
abstract: In the present paper we construct all typical finite-dimensional representations of the quantum Lie superalgebra $U_{q}[gl(2/2)]$ at generic deformation parameter $q$. As in the non-deformed case the finite-dimensional $U_{q}[gl(2/2)]$-module $W^{q}$ obtained is irreducible and can be decomposed into finite-dimensional irreducible $U_{q}[gl(2)\oplus gl(2)]$-submodules $V^{q}_{k}$
